name: localized_routes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool betsports.
Tool description: BetSports Api
API description: Fetches localized routing data from the Betsport API.

referer.description: The referer URL to be included in the API request headers. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

host.description: The host to be included in the API request headers. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.
